sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const Login = () => (
{/*

    Want to join out team?

    Family Connection Specialist

    Resilience Visitation Bozeman, MT

    Job details

    Full-time

    Qualifications

    Experience:

  • relevant, 2 years (Required)

    • Education:

  • Bachelor's (Required)

    • Full Job Description

    Let’s face it. Parenting can be hard. There’s a reason people say “it takes a village.” Resilience Visitation is seeking a professional in social services ready to come alongside parents navigating the child welfare system. We support parents in 1.) recognizing and meeting their children’s needs, 2.) having regular opportunities to connect with their children in foster care and 3.) developing the discipline and skill they need to address the concern(s) that led to their children’s removal. This will be a FT position. Resilience Visitation is an innovative new provider of family visitation in Bozeman, Livingston, and the surrounding area. We are led by our shared commitment to fostering resilience, offering dignity, and practicing transparency. We work closely with Child and Family Services, foster parents, and other service providers to bring separated families opportunities to nurture relationships in the most natural setting possible and to support parents as they work toward their treatment plan goals. We are seeking the right individual ready to enhance our ability to impact our community. This candidate is eager to help us serve and enrich families who lose custody of their children. They understand that everyone has a story and they know that change is a slow process. They will strive to bring empathy to every situation, learn to see dignity in every individual, and consistently offer our families accountability and opportunities for growth. Successful applicants will have a good driving record and access to their own vehicle suitable for transporting children. Mileage on personal vehicles will be reimbursed. Candidates in the Bozeman and Livingston areas are encouraged to apply.

    Our full time Family Connection Specialists -set and manage their own schedules -get paid to commute to visits -receive training in Visit Coaching -receive other opportunities for professional development -build their professional network in Livingston and the Gallatin Valley -make a lasting difference for the parents and children they work with -receive PTO -receive health insurance

    Job Type: Full-time Pay: $15.50 - $17.00 per hour Benefits: Flexible Schedule Health Insurance Paid Time Off Experience: relevant: 2 years (Required) Education: Bachelor's (Required) Work Location: Multiple locations This Job Is Ideal for Someone Who Is: Dependable -- more reliable than spontaneous Adaptable/flexible -- enjoys doing work that requires frequent shifts in direction Autonomous/Independent -- enjoys working with little direction High stress tolerance -- thrives in a high-pressure environment Company's Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/resiliencevisitation.org/?_tn=%2Cd%2CP-R&eid=ARAEtoXI7ZWTNDZ-uLBs9hzL8lZQYF0xztNXOCs-VNAa9JYUwUSwGE6BaMWe3UmOMJz724HfaCfPsZY Benefit Conditions: Only full-time employees eligible Work Remotely: No

      APPLY NOW
























*/}
); export default Login;
